mapper.sql: ( select u.id, u.login_name, a.create_by, a.id as article_id from sys_user u, cms_article a where a.create_by =u.id ) c
mapper.select: select c.id as "userid", c.name as "username" , c.countarticle as "countarticle" from ( SELECT c.id , c.name, count(c.article_id) as countarticle FROM ( select u.id, u.name, a.create_by, a.id as article_id from ${str}.sys_user u, ${str}.cms_article a, ${str}.cms_category c where a.create_by =u.id and a.DEL_FLAG='0' and u.DEL_FLAG='0' and c.id=a.category_id and c.del_flag='0' ) c group by c.id, c.name order by countarticle desc ) c LIMIT 5 offset 0
select user_id as "userid",user_name as "username",COUNT_ARTICLE as "countarticle" from CMS_PERSON_CONTRIBUTION order by COUNT_ARTICLE desc
SELECT USER_ID FROM CMS_PERSON_CONTRIBUTION WHERE USER_ID=#{userid}
SELECT O.NAME FROM SYS_USER U,SYS_OFFICE O WHERE U.OFFICE_ID=O.ID and u.id=#{userid}
